TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Stack`1<T> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<!T>, class System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection`1<!T>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class Stack(Of T) Implements ICollection, IEnumerable(Of T), IReadOnlyCollection(Of T)
generic <typename T> public ref class Stack : System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<T>, System::Collections::Generic::IReadOnlyCollection<T>, System::Collections::ICollection
type Stack<'T> = class interface seq<'T> interface ICollection interface IReadOnlyCollection<'T> interface IEnumerable

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 指定堆栈中元素的类型。

span.span: Specifies the type of elements in the stack.

summary.span: 表示可变大小的后进先出 (LIFO) 集合（对于相同指定类型的实例）。

span.span: Represents a variable size last-in-first-out (LIFO) collection of instances of the same specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为数组实现。 is implemented as an array. 堆栈和队列都是有用的信息; 需要临时存储时即当您可能想要检索其值后，放弃元素。Stacks and queues are useful when you need temporary storage for information; that is, when you might want to discard an element after retrieving its value. 使用如果需要访问存储在集合中的相同顺序中的信息。Use if you need to access the information in the same order that it is stored in the collection. 使用如果你需要按相反的顺序访问的信息。Use if you need to access the information in reverse order. 使用和类型需要同时从多个线程访问集合时。Use the and types when you need to access the collection from multiple threads concurrently. 一个常见用途是在对其他过程的调用过程中保留变量状态。A common use for is to preserve variable states during calls to other procedures. 可以对执行三个主要操作及其元素：Three main operations can be performed on a and its elements: - 在顶部插入一个元素。 inserts an element at the top of the . - 从顶部移除一个元素。 removes an element from the top of the . - 返回位于顶部的元素但不会删除从。 returns an element that is at the top of the but does not remove it from the . 容量是元素数目可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 如果是在堆栈的容量小于是 o （1） 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 是 o （1） 的操作。 is an O(1) operation. 接受`null`是有效的引用值类型以及允许重复的元素。 accepts `null` as a valid value for reference types and allows duplicate elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 一个，只要不修改该集合可以同时支持多个读取器。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 即便如此，枚举整个集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 此构造函数是 o （1） 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了此构造函数和多个方法的泛型类。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several methods of the generic class. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以容纳。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 元素添加到，自动增加容量所要求的重新分配内部数组。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果可以估计集合的大小，指定的初始容量，则无需要执行多个大小调整操作，同时将元素添加到。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 可以通过调用减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by calling . 将元素复制到按相同顺序读取这些的集合。The elements are copied onto the in the same order they are read by the of the collection. 此构造函数是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是中的元素数`collection`。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `collection`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了此构造函数和多个方法的泛型类。The following code example demonstrates this constructor and several methods of the generic class. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 已设置为零，并且对其他对象的集合的元素也被释放。 is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量保持不变。The capacity remains unchanged. 若要重置的容量，调用。To reset the capacity of the , call . 截去空的容量设置到默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定是否使用默认的相等比较的相等为`T`，列表中的值的类型。This method determines equality using the default equality comparer for `T`, the type of values in the list. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素复制到数组中先出 (LIFO) 顺序，由一系列调用返回的元素的顺序类似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. span.span: Gets the number of elements contained in the .
The number of elements contained in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容量是元素数目的可以存储。The capacity of the is the number of elements that the can store. 是中的实际的元素数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 容量始终是大于或等于。The capacity is always greater than or equal to . 如果添加元素时超过容量，容量会增加通过在复制旧元素和添加新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组。If exceeds the capacity while adding elements, the capacity is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几个属性和方法泛型类，其中包括属性。The following code example demonstrates several properties and methods of the generic class, including the property. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Collections.Generic.Stack`1/Enumerator<!T> GetEnumerator() cil managed
Public Function GetEnumerator () As Stack(Of T).Enumerator

summary.span: 返回 的一个枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the .
An for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示泛型类是可枚举。The following code example demonstrates that the generic class is enumerable. `foreach`语句 (`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中`for each`c + + 中) 用于枚举队列。The `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++) is used to enumerate the queue. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法类似于 方法，但 不修改 。This method is similar to the method, but does not modify the . 如果类型`T`是引用类型，`null`可以被推送到作为占位符，如有需要。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为数组实现。 is implemented as an array. 如果已经等于容量的容量自动重新分配内部数组中，增加和现有元素之前添加新元素将复制到新数组。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果类型`T`是引用类型，`null`可以被推送到作为占位符，如有需要。If type `T` is a reference type, `null` can be pushed onto the as a placeholder, if needed. 它占用堆栈中的槽，并且都被视为任何对象。It occupies a slot in the stack and is treated like any object. 如果是在堆栈的容量小于是 o （1） 操作。If is less than the capacity of the stack, is an O(1) operation. 如果需要增加以容纳新元素，容量会成为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 之前， 返回相同的对象。 returns the same object until is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回 。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 枚举与写访问的争用的极少数情况下，必须锁定在整个枚举期间的集合。In the rare case where enumerations contend with write accesses, you must lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 返回一个对象，可用于同步对。 returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 同步是所有线程访问集合之前都锁定此对象时才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock this object before accessing the collection. 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

value.span: 在 的默认实现中，此属性始终返回当前实例。

span.span: In the default implementation of , this property always returns the current instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator() cil managed
Function GetEnumerator () As IEnumerator Implements IEnumerable.GetEnumerator

summary.span: 返回循环访问集合的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through a collection.

returns.span: 可用于循环访问集合的 。

span.span: An that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `foreach` C# 语言的语句 (`for each` c + + 中`For Each`在 Visual Basic 中) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果进行了更改到集合中，例如添加、 修改或删除元素，该枚举数将失效且不可恢复，并且下次调用或引发。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 集合中的默认实现不同步。Default implementations of collections in are not synchronized. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance !T[] ToArray() cil managed

summary.span: 将 复制到新数组中。

span.span: Copies the to a new array.

returns.span: 新数组，包含 的元素的副本。

span.span: A new array containing copies of the elements of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将元素复制到数组中先出 (LIFO) 顺序，由一系列调用返回的元素的顺序类似。The elements are copied onto the array in last-in-first-out (LIFO) order, similar to the order of the elements returned by a succession of calls to . 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几种方法的泛型类，其中包括方法。The following code example demonstrates several methods of the generic class, including the method. 代码示例创建字符串的堆栈具有默认容量，并使用方法推送到堆栈上的五个字符串。The code example creates a stack of strings with default capacity and uses the method to push five strings onto the stack. 枚举堆栈的元素，这不会更改堆栈的状态。The elements of the stack are enumerated, which does not change the state of the stack. 方法用于弹出堆栈的第一个字符串。The method is used to pop the first string off the stack. 方法用来在堆栈中，查看下一项，然后方法用于弹出。The method is used to look at the next item on the stack, and then the method is used to pop it off. 方法用于创建数组并将堆栈元素复制到它，然后，该数组传递给构造函数采用，创建一份堆栈与元素的顺序反转。The method is used to create an array and copy the stack elements to it, then the array is passed to the constructor that takes , creating a copy of the stack with the order of the elements reversed. 显示复制的元素。The elements of the copy are displayed. 两次的堆栈大小将创建一个数组，和方法用于将数组元素数组的中间开始复制。An array twice the size of the stack is created, and the method is used to copy the array elements beginning at the middle of the array. 再次使用构造函数以使用反转的元素的顺序创建的堆栈副本; 因此，三个 null 元素位于结尾处。The constructor is used again to create a copy of the stack with the order of elements reversed; thus, the three null elements are at the end. 方法用于显示字符串"four"在堆栈上，第一个副本方法将清除复制和属性将显示在堆栈为空。The method is used to show that the string "four" is in the first copy of the stack, after which the method clears the copy and the property shows that the stack is empty. [!code-csharp[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Stack#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Stack/vb/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void TrimExcess() cil managed

summary.span: 如果元素数小于当前容量的 90%，将容量设置为 中的实际元素数。

span.span: Sets the capacity to the actual number of elements in the , if that number is less than 90 percent of current capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于最小化集合的内存开销如果任何新元素将不添加到集合。This method can be used to minimize a collection's memory overhead if no new elements will be added to the collection. 重新分配和复制较大的成本但是，有时会很大，因此方法不会执行任何操作，如果列表为在多个容量的 90%。The cost of reallocating and copying a large can be considerable, however, so the method does nothing if the list is at more than 90 percent of capacity. 这样可以避免产生相对较小增益的大型的重新分配费用。This avoids incurring a large reallocation cost for a relatively small gain. 此方法为 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。This method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 若要重置为其初始状态，请在调用方法之前调用方法。To reset a to its initial state, call the method before calling method. 截去空的容量设置到默认容量。Trimming an empty sets the capacity of the to the default capacity.
